Kamal Ahmed wrote:

> What would be the best way to test "Exception Classes"
> 
> 1.      Use <Source ClassName>Test extends ExceptionTestCase.
> 
> 2.      Use <Source ClassName>Test extends TestCase, and use an object which
> throws these Exceptions, and force a throw.
> 
> 3.      Any other innovative approach?

_JUnit Recipes_, recipe 2.8

or

Google "JUnit FAQ" and search for "exception".

Good luck.
